Create_Campaign_With_Schedule_Option_(Warning_Percentage_100%)
testcase.system-out: @scenario.begin @Test_Create_Campaign_Options_Send_Schedule_Voice_Bulk_5 @Test_Create_Campaign_Options_Send_Schedule_Voice_Bulk scenario: Create campaign with schedule option (warning percentage 100%) given I am on the campaign settings page "Bulk Voice" in "Voice" ... passed in 22.36s e given I select a company, and a name for the test "PRUEBAS AUTOMATIZADAS" ... passed in 4.156s when I select Send now/schedule option "2" ... passed in 1.288s when I enter a percentage "100" in the phase ... passed in 1.146s when I click the add phase ... passed in 1.273s then I see the error message "Please, check the percentages assigned to each phase; the total amount must be 100%" in "(//div[@class='ant-notification-notice-description'])[1]" ... passed in 2.09s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Create_Campaign_With_Schedule_Option_(Error_Date_)
testcase.system-out: @scenario.begin @Test_Create_Campaign_Options_Send_Schedule_Voice_Bulk_6 @Test_Create_Campaign_Options_Send_Schedule_Voice_Bulk scenario: Create campaign with schedule option (error date ) given I am on the campaign settings page "Bulk Voice" in "Voice" ... passed in 25.06s e given I select a company, and a name for the test "PRUEBAS AUTOMATIZADAS" ... passed in 3.906s when I select Send now/schedule option "2" ... passed in 1.275s when I enter a percentage "100" in the phase ... passed in 1.197s when I enter the today date in the phase ... passed in 1.804s when I click on the "next" button to continue ... passed in 3.331s then I see the error message "Every phase must have a configured date" in "(//div[@class='ant-notification-notice-description'])[1]" ... passed in 2.06s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Create_Campaign_With_Schedule_Option
testcase.system-out: @scenario.begin @Test_Create_Campaign_Options_Send_Schedule_Voice_Bulk_7 @Test_Create_Campaign_Options_Send_Schedule_Voice_Bulk scenario: Create campaign with schedule option given I am on the campaign settings page "Bulk Voice" in "Voice" ... passed in 22.98s e given I select a company, and a name for the test "PRUEBAS AUTOMATIZADAS" ... passed in 3.959s when I select Send now/schedule option "2" ... passed in 1.284s when I enter a percentage "50" in the phase ... passed in 1.256s when I enter the "today" date in the phase ... passed in 1.752s when I enter the "now" hour ... passed in 1.46s when I click the add phase ... passed in 1.31s when I enter a percentage "50" in the phase ... passed in 1.201s when I enter the "tomorrow" date in the phase ... passed in 1.607s when I enter the "tomorrow" hour ... passed in 1.553s when I click on the "next" button to continue ... passed in 3.35s then I am redirected to the destination creation page ... passed in 2.047s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
